item.title: Estyelf add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Estyelf add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Estyelf add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Estyelf add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Estyelf add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Estyelf add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Estyelf add a quote by yitzchok pinkesz
item.description: "shallow people equal human baboons" -- yitzchok pinkesz

item.title: Estyelf add a quote by esty pinkesz
item.description: "when you matter to no one then your truly alone" -- esty pinkesz

item.title: Estyelf add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Estyelf add a quote by Tennessee Williams
item.description: "When so many are lonely as seem to be lonely, it would be inexcusably selfish to be lonely alone." -- Tennessee Williams

item.title: Estyelf add a quote by Nathaniel Hawthorne
item.description: "No man, for any considerable period, can wear one face to himself and another to the multitude, without finally getting bewildered as to which may be the true." -- Nathaniel Hawthorne

item.title: Estyelf add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Estyelf add a quote by Robert Louis Stevenson
item.description: "You cannot run away from a weakness, you must sometimes fight it out or perish. And if that be so, why not now and where you stand?" -- Robert Louis Stevenson

item.title: Estyelf add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "Be not afraid of life believe that life is worth living and your belief will create the fact." -- Henry James

item.title: Estyelf add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Estyelf add a quote by Hakim Sanai
Estyelf add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description: "If knowledge can create problems, it is not through ignorance that we can solve them." -- Isaac Asimov
